roleset.name: sense

example.name: Args 0 & 1, within LVC
example.text: But just about any successful company has a clear sense of its limitations , because otherwise it would n't be able to differentiate itself in the marketplace and reduce its vulnerablility to price wars .
example.arg: because otherwise it wouldn't be able to differentiate itself in the marketplace and reduce its vulnerablility to price wars .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Her sense of herself as a female artist, choice of materials, Jewishness, and place in the artistic pantheon are, even today, hotly debated by art

roleset.note: Based on verb entry sense.01; corresponds to VNcls see-30.1-1.

example.name: LVB
example.text: `` It does n't make sense to parachute out at this price , '' Mr. Steinhardt says , though he has stopped his takeover talk and now commends USAir managers ' `` operating skills . ''
example.arg: to parachute out at this price
